content: *this pattern uses puff and post stitches to create a look similar to aran knit perfect for carrying around your next project-in-progress lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20169 *ckc-alloccasiontote pdf* skill level intermediate level 3 lion® cotton article #760 3 balls crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm special stitches puff st 1 double_crochet/rf pattern is written in u s crochet terminology *free registration at site required to access patterns *
